data.title: Alphabet  ( Google )  Stock Investors Just Got More Bad News From a Federal Judge
data.summary: In 2020, the Justice Department sued Google, a subsidiary of Alphabet ( NASDAQ: GOOGL ) ( NASDAQ: GOOG ) , accusing the company of operating an illegal monopoly in online search. In 2023, the Justice Department filed another lawsuit, accusing the company of operating an illegal monopoly in adtech ...

data.title: Google Scores Partial Win In Antitrust Case But Faces Setback On Publisher Tools - Alphabet  ( NASDAQ:GOOGL )
data.summary: US Department of Justice wins antitrust case against Google, ruling it maintained a monopoly in ad tech through anticompetitive practices. Google faces appeals after court dismisses some antitrust claims but supports the Justice Department's push for a breakup.

data.title: How quantum could supercharge Google's AI ambitions
data.summary: Inside a secretive set of buildings in Santa Barbara, California, scientists at Alphabet are working on one of the company's most ambitious bets yet.

data.title: Forget the Correction: 2 Artificial Intelligence Stocks That Are Still Worth Buying Anyway
data.summary: It hasn't been the best start to 2025 for many U.S. stock market indexes and top tech companies. The S&P 500 barely escaped a correction, the Dow Jones is down, and the Nasdaq Composite is officially in a correction after escaping its short-lived bear market.There are a few reasons for these ...
